snippet.title: LEGO Studios Backlot 2020 + How To Play In Description! (FULL GAME)
snippet.description: This is played on Flashpoint 7.1 Infinity. A full play-through of the 2002 LEGO Shockwave game "Backlot". If you would like to play, please download Flashpoint 7.1 Infinity at https://bluemaxima.org/flashpoint/ NOTE: Flashpoint does contain many games I consider inappropriate so please exercise caution. To play Backlot in Flashpoint, you will also need to download the extension in Flashpoint to play Shockwave games. As always, please keep comments Family Friendly or I will delete them. Thank you for watching! Please check out my other LEGO Universe videos, and if you would like to see more old LEGO games, please leave a comment below telling me which ones you would like to see!
